channel.title: Galleries on The Lybry
channel.description: Recent content in Galleries on The Lybry

item.title: Gallery
item.description: Hello, this is my personal art gallery, everything is ordered in descending order of time made and I will add some text and info to each image. I havent found a better way to do this yet, without having to redo stuff so this should work fine. Also you can use the images on here noncomercially if you link me somewhere visible. Billie the goat Date: 10th, 02.2021 This is the protagonist of the game billies bust up and I got an earworm from that so I just drew him
